resources.string:
● Develop an App called “BuMa” to recognize spice or seasoning in indonesia
● The main target of the application is to educate younger audience that lacks of knowledge about seasoning/spice
● This app will provide a short information about the spice.
● At developed part, this app hoped to be able to recognize 5 different spice

Our background for choosing this topic is because many people in Indonesia are still confused about the differences between kitchen spices on the market. Therefore, we want to create a product that can help to make it easier to recognize the types of kitchen spices on the market.\n\nAnd we have the scope of this application is :

The creator of this application is
(ML) M2135J1633- Muh. Fathurrahman Haidir- Politeknik Negeri Ujung Pandang
(ML) M2227F2094- Kumala Cantika Ainun Maya- Universitas Jember
